dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 100 IH: Nested Quotes Test Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Smith introduced the following bill

form.official-title: To test nested quote handling in XML parsing.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Nested Quotes Test Act.

Section 200(a) of the Example Act is amended by adding at the end the following: For purposes of the preceding sentence, the term non-invasive means, with respect to a diagnostic device, that the device does not penetrate the skin..
Title 18, United States Code, is amended-

subsection.text: by striking Attorney General each place such term appears and inserting Secretary of Homeland Security; and

paragraph.text: by striking shall and inserting may; and
by adding at the end the following: The Secretary may waive this requirement upon a finding of good cause..
